siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: Dear listener, Stan is liking Jon’s new look - shaped beard, new glasses and all. Jon tells about his experience getting new glasses from Warby Parker. The rest of the episode is spent discussion Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker. This episode includes many many many spoilers. So…

frontmatter.title: The Episode Where We Spoil The Rise of Skywalker
